item.title: 50 Hip-Hop Records for 50 Years of Hip-Hop Mix
item.description: Just fifty favorite records of mine that I happen to own in vinyl in no particular order. Mostly 90s 'backpacker' type stuff - it's a reflection of when I was collecting at the time, and doesn't necessarily represent all my favorite artists or favorite songs, many of which never were released on vinyl. I've never made a mix this long, and admittedly I ended up doing it in three separate parts. There was no real planning besides making sure I played 50 different records. Hope you dig it! Feed: http://everydaybeats.net/mixtapes/monthlymixtapes_itunes.xml

item.title: Bonus: Friendly Holiday Greetings
item.description: Enjoy these holiday greetings from whoever we could find. Because this will be our last podcast of the year, we here at A Couple of Friends with No Class want to wish you all a Merry Christmas, Happy Holidays, and a very Happy New Year... Feed: https://anchor.fm/s/6a3303c8/podcast/rss
